## âœ… Cáº£i thiá»‡n hiá»‡u á»©ng collapsible sidebar hoÃ n thÃ nh!

### ğŸš€ **Nhá»¯ng tá»‘i Æ°u Ä‘Ã£ thá»±c hiá»‡n:**

#### 1. **Sidebar Animation**:
- âœ… Thay Ä‘á»•i tá»« `spring` sang `tween` vá»›i `cubic-bezier` easing mÆ°á»£t mÃ  hÆ¡n
- âœ… Giáº£m duration tá»« 500ms xuá»‘ng 250ms
- âœ… ThÃªm `will-change-transform` Ä‘á»ƒ tá»‘i Æ°u GPU rendering
- âœ… Loáº¡i bá» CSS transition trÃ¹ng láº·p vá»›i Framer Motion

#### 2. **MenuItem Optimizations**:
- âœ… Giáº£m scale effect tá»« `1.02` xuá»‘ng `1.01` (Ã­t dramatic hÆ¡n)
- âœ… Giáº£m hover movement tá»« `6px` xuá»‘ng `4px`
- âœ… Thay Ä‘á»•i tá»« `spring` sang `tween` vá»›i duration 150ms

#### 3. **Icon & Effects**:
- âœ… Giáº£m icon rotation tá»« `10Â°` xuá»‘ng `5Â°` vÃ  scale tá»« `1.1` xuá»‘ng `1.05`
- âœ… Thay shine effect phá»©c táº¡p báº±ng CSS transition Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n
- âœ… Tá»‘i Æ°u badge animation vá»›i duration ngáº¯n hÆ¡n

#### 4. **Text Expansion**:
- âœ… ThÃªm `overflow-hidden` Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh layout shift
- âœ… Giáº£m duration tá»« 300ms xuá»‘ng 200ms
- âœ… ThÃªm `mode="wait"` cho AnimatePresence
- âœ… TÃ¡ch riÃªng opacity transition

#### 5. **Performance Enhancements**:
- âœ… ThÃªm debounce cho mouse events (50ms enter, 100ms leave)
- âœ… Sá»­ dá»¥ng `will-change-transform` cho GPU acceleration
- âœ… Loáº¡i bá» cÃ¡c animation khÃ´ng cáº§n thiáº¿t

### ğŸ¯ **Káº¿t quáº£:**
- **MÆ°á»£t mÃ  hÆ¡n**: Sidebar expand/collapse giá» Ä‘Ã¢y mÆ°á»£t nhÆ° butter
- **Nhanh hÆ¡n**: Giáº£m lag vÃ  stuttering
- **Tá»± nhiÃªn hÆ¡n**: Animation feels more natural vÃ  responsive
- **Performance tá»‘t hÆ¡n**: Ãt táº£i CPU/GPU hÆ¡n

BÃ¢y giá» sidebar sáº½ hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng mÆ°á»£t mÃ  vÃ  responsive hÆ¡n nhiá»u! ğŸ‰
